tweet.text: RT @USHouseHistory: #OTD, the 1st and only former #POTUS was elected to the House. Hint: he was a former Sec of State. @HistoryAtState http…
tweet.html: RT @USHouseHistory: #OTD, the 1st and only former #POTUS was elected to the House. Hint: he was a former Sec of State. @HistoryAtState 1.usa.gov/1u9QkEW
